Reviews.Title: Ok for price
Reviews.Author: Anna K.
Reviews.Content: The mini disk came broke, playback freezes system often, glitch or bug in startup software. The system I purchaced had turret cams not bullet like in pic which is what I ordered dont know why the pic is different now.

ProductInfo.Features:
With newest third generation P2P/ Plug and play in security industry, no need to set DNNS and network port
you just need to install the client application to remote view from PC, scan QR Code to view live video from Smartphone
Email alarm and SMS alarm function
Motion detective
With HDMI Port
ProductInfo.Name: SANNCE 8CH H.264 HDMI Realtime Smartphone View DVR with P2P/QR Code+ 4 x 480TVL Cameras Night Vision Surveillance System
